name: bazel-emscripten
description: Hello World to WebAssembly using Bazel and Emscripten

scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:wasm
scripts.clean: bazel clean --expunge && rm -rf hello-world/javascript/bin/* && rm -rf hello-world/javascript/dist/*
scripts.prerollup: rm -rf hello-world/javascript/bin/* && rm -rf hello-world/javascript/dist/* && npm run build:copy
